name: Perplexing Purple Puzzle
description:
You control a purple ball, and your goal is to send it to the strange portal.

The problem? There is a hole in a wall that is too small to get through.

Solution: Lower your health with red triangles to fit through small passages.

Another problem: There is one of those triangles on the other end of the hole. If you are too small when you go through, you will die.

Solution MK 2: Green squares restore your health!

There are also buttons that open doors.

And a secret ending that fits the theme better than the rest of the game.

Made for the WOWIE Jam 3.0 in the Godot engine. The theme is "Failure is Progress."

"Music" and sounds made by me in Bosca Ceoil. The font is Roboto-Regular. I think I need to give credit for that...
